Activity: Log in, check emails. Review the feedback from @clinlead-1 regarding the clinical relevance of the data collection workflow. Incorporate this feedback into the training module.

Finalize the script for the data collection workflow training video. Ensure the script is accurate, concise, and engaging. Review the script with @qatest-1 for clarity and accuracy. @QATEST-1 Topic: Review of Data Collection Workflow Training Video Script

Begin recording the data collection workflow training video. Utilize the test EHR environment to demonstrate the process step-by-step. Ensure the video is clear, well-lit, and professionally produced. If assistance is needed, reach out to the IT department for support. @ITPM-1 Topic: Assistance with Recording Training Video.
Review and edit the recorded video footage. Add annotations, captions, and callouts to enhance clarity and understanding. Ensure the audio is clear and free of background noise.
Complete the EHR data elements training module. Incorporate feedback from @qatest-2 regarding clarity and accuracy. @QATEST-2 Topic: EHR Data Element Training Module Review

Develop a hands-on exercise for the EHR data elements module. This exercise will allow trainees to practice entering and validating data in the EHR system. Collaborate with @ehrdev-1 and @ehrdev-2 to ensure the exercise is feasible and effective. @EHRDEV-1 @EHRDEV-2 Topic: Hands-on Exercise for EHR Data Elements Module

Review the learning objectives for both training modules. Ensure the modules align with the overall goals of the EHR data collection and influenza trend analysis project. Contact @pchmp-1 for feedback on aligning the training with physician needs. @PCHMP-1 Topic: Aligning Training with Physician Needs
Finalize the agenda for upcoming training sessions.
